Specimen Type: Pure fungal isolates from clinical specimens
Purpose: To determine the minimum inhibitory concentration of Itraconazole needed to inhibit fungal growth, thereby assessing isolate susceptibility.
Container: Sterile Petri dish (culture plate) or microdilution plate
Equipment: Incubator (35°C ±2°C); spectrophotometer; microdilution plate; inoculating loops; pipettes
